channel.title: Linux Journal's Reality 2.0
channel.itunes:author: Linux Journal
channel.description: Reality 2.0 by Linux Journal. Join Doc Searls and Katherine Druckman as they navigate the new digital world, covering topics related to Linux and Open Source, as well as digital privacy, security, and other current issues.

item.title: Episode 23: Advertisers: Don't Be Creepy
item.description:
Katherine Druckman and Doc Searls talk to Linux Journal's Danna Vedder about the current state of advertising.

  • Download ogg format
item.dc:creator: Linux Journal

itunes:summary.p: Katherine Druckman and Doc Searls talk to Linux Journal's Danna Vedder about the current state of advertising.

item.title: Episode 22: Don't Panic, It's All About the Kernel
item.description:

  • Download in ogg format

item.title: Episode 3: Microsoft and Patents
item.description:
Doc Searls and Katherine Druckman talk to Erich Andersen, Corporate Vice President, Deputy General Counsel at Microsoft and Keith Bergelt, CEO of Open Invention Network about Microsoft's recently announced membership with the Open Invention Network patent community.

Useful links:

https://www.openinventionnetwork.com/pressrelease_details/?id=89

https://azure.microsoft.com/en-us/blog/microsoft-joins-open-invention-network-to-help-protect-linux-and-open-source/

  • Download ogg format
item.dc:creator: Linux Journal

itunes:summary.p: Doc Searls and Katherine Druckman talk to Erich Andersen, Corporate Vice President, Deputy General Counsel at Microsoft and Keith Bergelt, CEO of Open Invention Network about Microsoft's recently announced membership with the Open Invention Network patent community.
Useful links:
